1.heading: Pleasure
1.raw:
The first line is always the foundation and it is introspection. The first line is called Pleasure.
Understand, that that the whole thing about answers is that they are pleasurable. There is a pleasure in getting answers. That is why logic has to be seductive for us. It is necessary. It
brings us pleasure to have answers.

Ultimate pleasure cannot be achieved without perfect timing. To give an answer at the wrong time can be disastrous. People have to be ready for that. Moon exalted. The instinct to know the
right moment and circumstances where pleasure is rewarded and not punished. You can give

Page 1

an answer at one time and have a very angry response. You give an answer at another time and everybody is happy. The same is true for correction. One moment you offer to correct
somebody and they think that you are bitching and the next moment the very same thing can be accepted as being valuable. It is a matter of knowing what the timing is.

Earth in detriment. Timing is not a product of discipline. Exaggerated self-discipline leads to the abuse of pleasure. The most important thing about people who have the fourth gate is that they
don't decide the timing. They are ready for the right time.

The potential to recognize that there is a natural timing to the understanding process. It is not about deciding the timing; it is about being ready for the right time. It is there, it comes. It is
collective. In order for an answer to be valid, it still has to become an opinion. It still has to get its details. It still has to be experimented with. It has to go through that whole process.

The other side is: The potential to recognize but the urge to force the timing. People who have this detriment always want to give you the answer at the wrong time. You are busy and they
have the answer and they won't let you do your thing. They have to give you the answer when you do not appreciate it, and then it does not get shared properly. The first line knows very little
about the other side. The key in all of this is to recognize the nature of timing, to be ready in the understanding and then you do not get punished.

2.heading: Acceptance
2.raw:
Here, we get to the line of projection and we know with the projection that there is no introspection in that process. The introspection is all about timing. When you go to the tantric
channel of this, you get to the 15/5. You get to being in the flow; you get to the Rhythm. You get to the timing mechanism. Timing is at the core of giving answers. When you get to the second
line, the projection line, there is no introspection to recognize the nature of the timing.

The line of Acceptance. The recognition of limitation in oneself and others leads to tolerance and the suspension of judgment. Moon exalted. The glorification of feelings. The mother which
always pardons the errant child. Mars in detriment. The assertion of the ego at the expense of others' failures.

In the white book, the Moon exalted. The potential to recognize that not everyone can understand. The first thing that happens to the person that is projecting out their answer and not
being aware of the timing is that they project out their answer and other people just don't get it.
They are not ready for it. It is not the right time. It is not the right moment. It is not the right place. Because of that, they have the sense of "They don't understand me. Why don't they
understand me?" Then there is this sense of "Maybe they will. It is too bad that they do not understand." There is this sense of "Poor them. I have to be patient with them," instead of
realizing that it is simply coming at the wrong time.

The other side is: The potential to take advantage of the lack of understanding in others. Here we have the ability to see very clearly in the projection that the others do not understand. "If
they don't understand I will take advantage of the understanding." In other words, "If they don't get it, I won't share it with them. I'll just do it myself." Usually, disaster and Terminal disease
follow.

3.heading: Irresponsibility
3.raw:
Page 2

The third line is about adaptation. We get to the end of the trigram. The third line is rooted in the wave of bonds made and broken. I have my design Saturn in this line and I know it very well. It
is called Irresponsibility. I claim it boldly: "I am not responsible." The general refusal to apply oneself diligently when one can get by with much loss effort. This is a deep facility to be able to
come up with answers and give them to other people.

Venus exalted. Where art is more valued than the artist. Understanding and collecting answers was something for me that I did, but I never applied them to my life. I just collected answers.
That's all. It did not make any difference to me what it would mean to me personally. I was just collecting answers because that is what the 4.3 can do.

Pluto in detriment. The rationalization of irresponsibility as an act of refocalization. They need to collect these answers for whatever reason.

The potential to enjoy the formulas with no regard to their practical application. None. It is just a matter of having answers. The other side of this is: The potential to justify such a process in
order to maintain it, which is a lovely thing to do. I have been doing that all of my life.
Fortunately, now I do something with them. It is a very funny trait.

4.heading: The Liar
4.raw:
We reach the upper trigram and get to the resonance of the first line, the Pleasure and the timing process. Here you have The Liar. Role playing as an art form. The actor.

Sun exalted. Fantasy protects and nurtures a sense of purpose and reason, no matter how misguided. Saturn in detriment. Time always brings humiliation. Here, time is mentioned again.
You play the game of having the answer. Let's say you are sitting in an office and your boss walks by and says, "By the way, do you know how to run the 41762 machine?'" and you say,
"Yes". It is your role to say yes and you play out that role. If you do not really know, you will have to find out how it works very quickly from somebody else before the boss says, "Did you
get it done?" Often, time will bring humiliation.

This is pretending to understand, which can be wonderful. It can be very artistic. It helps to be able to explain an understanding if what you are pretending to understand is really something
you do understand.

The potential to find or illustrate the formulas through fantasy. What really happens to these people is that they are driven (Youthful Folly, yes, I know) to figure it out. This is their way of
getting to understand. First they lie and then they run like hell to catch up with their lie. Every once in a while they get caught up in the game.

The other side is: The potential danger to see the fantasy as fact. This is because the moment you say, "I know how to run the 41762 machine," and the boss says, "Okay, show me," you are
in big trouble.

5.heading: Seduction
5.raw:
Here we come to a real key to the nature of what the whole logical process is about. The fifth line is a line of universalization and the fifth line wave has to do with the nature of seduction.
This fifth line is called Seduction. It is one of the things to recognize about the nature of the logic system (and I can't repeat it too often) that you have three gates of the logic system in the

Page 3

throat. The 62nd, the 31 st and the 16th gate are not pointed towards a motor. It is enormously difficult for logic to find its energy. One of the keys to that is the capacity to be able to seduce
that energy. "Would you please finance my experiment?" That is a very difficult thing to do in this world. There are millions and millions of people trying to get somebody to finance their
experiment so that they can prove something and bring their solution.

The nature of seduction in terms of the logic process is the universalizing element of answers.
An answer that has universal potential is deeply seductive. When you are looking at these fifth lines of potential, I hope you get the image of them that they are deeply spiritual or religious. We
saw the fifth line, The Saint, in the abstract process, The Confessor in the individual process, and here you come to The Seducer. Remember, at the other end, you have a black magic gate
in the same circuit. The seduction is: "I have an answer for you but you have to provide me with some energy, and then I will give it to you."

Allowing others to assume responsibility as a shield against potential punishment. You have to get them to understand so that they will take the chance with the experiment, so that they will
bring the energy to it. More than any other of those lines, this line recognizes that the answer will only work if there is energy.

Jupiter exalted. Unearned reward and recognition. Pluto in detriment. A life of lip service to antiquated and unsatisfying values. Cynicism. This is the cynicism that says, "I am the one that
has the answer, and I have to go around seducing people to try to get the energy." What I call the money lenders. You have to go out into this world. I can remember, in the days before my
work was published, what it was like to go to publishers and have them laugh at me. They told me that I was just bananas.

The potential to succeed through the understanding of others. Logic is a collective process and it is about sharing, and it is deeply important to understand others. Again, it goes back to the 1
8th gate and the resonance to that other potential that is about human rights. It is about recognizing that the real answer for humanity is very important.

The potential for cynicism that comes with always having to acknowledge the understanding of others. They have to

understand you in order that you can get your understanding out. These people can be very bitter. The dull thing is when it stops there at the 4th gate because whoever gets it to the throat
gets all the credit. Whoever speaks the voice of that opinion in detail is the one that gets the credit and not the seducer in the 4th. Those who speak it in the throat and the understanding is
refuted is the one that gets punished, not the seducer.

6.heading: Excess
6.raw:
Here you get to the sixth line, to the roof of the house and this line of transition. This is actually a very fascinating line because these people do want to understand. They are not interested in
answers. They know how easy answers are. They are very aware of that. They tend to be people who, for example, as students have an enormous difficulty learning this. They have
difficulties in bothering to understand at all. They are looking for something else. They are looking for the next line which is the 29.1 , The Abysmal, the gate of saying yes, and the gate of
making a commitment to a process. It is actually making a commitment to life itself. These people say, "The answer does not matter but life matters. I do not care what your guru says. I
am happy chopping wood." Life matters.

The line is called Excess. Repeated and conscious abuse of norms will not escape discipline. In refusing to pay any attention to your answers, you can end up in situations where understanding
is the only thing that will save you, and you will get punished because you are not ready. You haven't been open to understanding.

Page 4

Mercury exalted. The development through experience of techniques to apply self-restraint.
These people do not offer you their answers. They are looking for something else. They are looking for life itself. It is not the answer they are seeking out. The answer doesn't mean
anything to them. For them it is just purely intellectual and these are of course very intellectual gates. They are not about what you do. They are just about coming up with formulas and the
sixth line knows that. That answer is not what life is about. Life is life.

The other side of this has Mars in detriment. The gall to accept punishment as the price of excess. "Well, I don't want to understand so I am not going to school. I will not be what you think
I should be. I am more interested in going out and living my life. The answer is not important to me."

In the white book, Mercury exalted. The potential in a logical process to recognize when the understanding is not complete and have the patience to wait out the process. The answer does
not mean anything; only life means something.

Mars in detriment. Despite recognizing the incompleteness a lack of patience with the process.
"I can't be bothered with all of this. It is not important to me. Where is my life? Do I have a life?"
These are people who always wonder whether they have a life. What is very funny about these people is that, like the 47.6, they are actually ready to go straight down against the circuit to the
other side. The 47.6 wants the truth. It is not interested in what makes sense. It is looking to the
17. Can I get an opinion? Will the facts help me?

When you come to the 4.6, the logical gate, it is looking for the life. It is looking for an idea. It is ready to cross the circuit, to break the circuit and jump over to the other side. They are both
collective, after all, and mirrors of each other. So at the end of their process, they are both looking at each other. One wants to be a believer and one wants to understand. It is quite a nice
joke.

HEXAGRAM 4: YOUTHFUL FOLLY

We come to the logical collective. The experience of the abstract side is always going from the present to the past, and the experience of the individual process is the dealing with the present.
When we come to the logic process, there is the need to project into the future. Everything about the logic process is about finding a way in which we can be secure in the nature of the
direction that we take in our lives so that humanity can be preserved.

The 4 th hexagram is the need to be able to provide a solution that can be experimented with, to guarantee the perfection of the human process. Logic is universal in all life forms and so the
logical mind is of enormous value to humanity It is the only part of the mind that directly asks questions and gives answers. The 4 th hexagram is called Youthful Folly. The question is
coming from the 63, the gate of doubt, and what we have here is the channel of Logic, a design of mental ease mixed with doubt.

The 4 th gate is the gate of formulization and the potential is the awareness to judge what is suspicious in the pattern or not. It is concentration on the pattern to come up with the answer.
The question is: "Is it suspicious, or not?" The answer is about answering the question about the pattern. Everything about the logical process is about patterns. The doubt is always initiated by
a pattern. The answer always has to do with whether that pattern is worthy of doubt.

Remember the nature of the 18 th gate in the correction process. The 4 th gate, like the 18 th gate, has a gift. The 1 8 th gate has the ability to be able to recognize at any given moment what needs
to be corrected. The 4 th gate has the gift of always being able to come up with an answer. Both of those are risky things because what can be corrected at any given moment and an answer
that can be provided at any given moment is not necessarily the truth, nor is it necessarily something that will prove to be of value to humanity once it has been tested and experimented
with. One always has to be deeply suspicious of logical answers. Answers are the beginning of a process. They are the generation of a formula. The 4th gate is the gate of formulization. An
answer is a formula. The formula is: it is suspicious, or not.

It says above the lines: The energy to beguile and succeed despite ignorance. Freedom

from retribution. I am reminded of Groucho Marx, whom I love very much. A waiter came up to him and asked him, "How did you find your steak?" "Beside the tomatoes and underneath the
lettuce." The capacity to come up with an answer has nothing to do with the truth. It is a gift to answer. I know; I have the fourth gate. It does not mean that it is the truth, and this is so
important to understand. It can only be the truth after it has been tested and experimented with.
It does not matter how clever the answer is. The fact of the matter is that, for the benefit of humanity, everything that is logical has to be tested and experimented with. The answer is only
the beginning of a process.
